column1: Can you tell me a little about yourself?
How did you hear about this position?
What do you know about our company?
Why do you want to work here?
Why are you leaving your current job?
What are you looking for in a new position?
What can you offer us that someone else can't?
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?
What's your dream job?
What are your professional goals?
Can you describe your experience at your current or previous role?
How would you describe your work style?
How has your current role evolved since you started?
What challenges have you faced and how did you overcome them?
Can you explain the gap in your employment history?
What accomplishments are you most proud of?
How do you handle stress and pressure?
Describe a time you disagreed with a decision from your manager?
How do you prioritize your tasks?
Describe a mistake you made and how you handled it?
How do you handle failure?
How do you evaluate success?
What are your strengths?
What are your weaknesses?
What technical skills do you possess that would benefit our team?
Can you describe a time when you led a team?
How do you handle feedback?
Describe a situation where you had to collaborate with a difficult colleague?
How do you educate yourself on our industry and its challenges?
How would you handle working with a difficult colleague?
What do you think are the biggest challenges in this role?
How do you approach difficult job tasks?
What experience do you have with software tools and techniques for this role?
How would you deal with an unhappy customer or client?
How do you stay updated with the latest industry trends?
Describe a project you led from start to finish.
How familiar are you with industry regulations or standards?
Have you ever had to introduce a new idea or procedure to a team?
Describe a time when you had to make a tough decision without all the information you needed.
How would your colleagues describe you?
How do you handle work-life balance?
What are you passionate about?
What motivates you?
Describe the best work culture you've been part of.
How do you handle criticism?
What values are most important to you in a job?
How do you handle new challenges or unfamiliar tasks?
Do you prefer to work in a team or alone?
How do you handle tight deadlines?
What would you do if you found out a team member was providing incorrect information?
